resources.description: Finds the recommendations of question, answer association.
resources.name: /recommendations/question/<question_id>/answer/<answer_id>

resources.description: Finds the list of recommendations of a given module.
resources.name: /recommendations/module/<ID>

resources.description: Removes the mapping between a module and its recommendations.
resources.name: /recommendations/module/<ID>

resources.description: Removes the mapping of a module and a recommendation (DB Table Recommendation_Question_Answer)
resources.name: /recommendations/<ID>/module/<ID>

resources.description: Finds Answers of a Question by the ID of the question.
resources.name: /question/<ID>/answers

resources.description: Finds Answers of a Question by ID of question and ID of the answer.
resources.name: /question/<ID>/answer/<ID>

resources.description: Find the groups of the user ID.
resources.name: /user/<email>/groups

resources.description: Check if the user is an administrator.
resources.name: /user/<email>/admin

resources.description: Get the tree of a module. This tree contains all the questions and answers.
resources.name: /module/<ID>/tree

resources.description: Starts a new session for a given module ID.
resources.name: /session

resources.description: Ends a user's session by the ID of the session.
resources.name: /session/<ID>/end

resources.description: Ends a user's session by the ID of the session.
resources.name: /session/<ID>/closed

resources.description: Finds a session by ID (open or closed).
resources.name: /session/<ID>

resources.description: Update a Session. Specifically, by adding an answer to a question.
resources.name: /session/<ID>

resources.description: Get dependencies of a given module.
resources.name: /dependency/module/<ID>

resources.description: Finds a dependency of a module, taking as arguments the id of the current module and the id of the module that it depends on.
resources.name: /dependency/module/<ID>/depends/<ID>
